short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Getting qr code of current page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a quick chrome extension that gives you a QR code for the google chrome page that you are accessing. This makes it very easy to send links through text, or to access them on your phone as the you can just take a picture of the QR code straight from your computer.
